pkgmetadata.longdescription: MASCOTNUM / RT-UQ Algorithms Template Tools // Helper functions for MASCOTNUM / RT-UQ https://uq.math.cnrs.fr/ algorithm template, for design of numerical experiments practice: algorithm template parser to support MASCOTNUM specification https://github.com/MASCOTNUM/algorithms, 'ask tell' decoupling injection (inspired by https://search.r- project.org/CRAN/refmans/sensitivity/html/decoupling.html) to use "crimped" algorithms (like uniroot(), optim(), ...) from outside R, basic template examples: Brent algorithm for 1 dim root finding and L-BFGS-B from base optim().
